description: Recommended MCP servers for the QA / Static Analysis profile.

recommended_usage: Audit dependencies for security, license, and maintenance risk.
Guide safer dependency choices during code generation and reviews.

config_fragments.codex_config_toml:
[mcp_servers.sonatype-deps]
# Refer to official Sonatype MCP setup for the correct command/args.
command = "<TO_FILL>"
config_fragments.notes: Fill in command/args from Sonatype docs; keep credentials outside VCS.

recommended_usage: Fetch versioned, up-to-date library and framework docs.
Disambiguate APIs across versions during coding and review.

config_fragments.codex_config_toml:
[mcp_servers.context7-docs]
# Provide the Context7 binary/command per Upstash docs.
command = "<TO_FILL>"
config_fragments.notes: Requires Context7 token/config; supply via env vars or secrets manager.

recommended_usage: Browse repos, issues, and pull requests from within the agent.
Trigger safe workflow automation during reviews.

config_fragments.codex_config_toml:
[mcp_servers.github]
# Configure with a fine-scoped GitHub token; see official docs.
command = "<TO_FILL>"
config_fragments.notes: Use least-privilege PAT/OIDC; avoid broad org scopes.

recommended_usage: Search QA artefacts (logs, traces, test outputs) during debugging.
Index and query code/search indexes to speed up static analysis triage.

config_fragments.codex_config_toml:
[mcp_servers.elasticsearch]
# Point to Elasticsearch endpoint; keep credentials out of VCS.
command = "<TO_FILL>"
config_fragments.notes: Prefer scoped API keys; consider read-only roles by default.

recommended_usage: Optional: external web lookups for CVEs/mitigations when consented.
Use sparingly for cross-checking QA findings with public sources.

config_fragments.codex_config_toml:
[mcp_servers.apify-web-search]
# Provide Apify token via env var; enable only with consent.
command = "<TO_FILL>"
config_fragments.notes: Do not enable by default; sends queries to external services.
